01182 /* =======================================
01183    Backplane Provided API function tray
01184    ===================================== */
01185 
01187 typedef struct bp_api_struct {
01188 
01189 // ----- Backplane and frameworks setup API
01190 
01191     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(register_framework);       
01192     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(get_version);              
01193     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(add_root_node);            
01194     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(run_test);                 
01195     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(reset);                    
01196     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(set_trace_mode);           
01197 
01198 // ---- Service API
01199 
01200     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(register_srv_providers);   
01201 
01202 // ---- Phasing API
01203 
01204     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(notify_phase);             
01205     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(transmit_phase);           
01206     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(notify_runtime_phase);     
01207     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(notify_phase_done);        
01208 
01209 // ----- TLM Common API
01210 
01211     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(connect);                  
01212     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(get_connector_size);       
01213     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(notify_end_blocking);      
01214 
01215 // ----- Max Pack Size API
01216 
01217     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(get_pack_max_size);        
01218     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(set_pack_max_size);        
01219 
01220 // ----- Type identification and mapping API
01221 
01222     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(get_type_id_from_name);    
01223     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(get_type_name_from_id);    
01224     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(set_match_types);          
01225 
01226 // ----- TLM1 put interface
01227 
01228     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(nb_put);                   
01229     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(can_put);                  
01230     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(request_put);              
01231     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(put);                      
01232 
01233 // ----- TLM1 get interface 
01234 
01235     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(nb_get);                   
01236     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(can_get);                  
01237     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(request_get);              
01238     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(get_requested);            
01239     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(get);                      
01240   
01241 // ----- TLM1 peek interface
01242 
01243     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(nb_peek);                  
01244     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(can_peek);                 
01245     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(request_peek);             
01246     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(peek_requested);           
01247     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(peek);                     
01248 
01249 // ----- TLM1 transport interface
01250 
01251     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(nb_transport);             
01252     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(request_transport);        
01253     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(transport_response);       
01254     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(transport);                
01255 
01256 // ----- Analysis interface
01257 
01258     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(write);                    
01259 
01260 // ----- TLM2 API
01261 
01262     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(b_transport_tlm2);         
01263     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(request_b_transport_tlm2); 
01264     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(b_transport_tlm2_response);
01265     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(nb_transport_fw);          
01266     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(nb_transport_bw);          
01267     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(transport_dbg);            
01268 
01269     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(turn_off_transaction_mapping); 
01270     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(assign_transaction_id);    
01271 
01272 // ----- Framework synchronization API
01273 
01274     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(synchronize);              
01275 
01276 // ----- ML Hierarchical construction API
01277 
01278     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(create_child_junction_node); 
01279 
01280     /* Configuration and resources API */
01281 
01294     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(notify_resource);
01295 
01307     BP_PROVIDED_API_FUNCTION(notify_config);
01308 } bp_api_struct;
